purpleculture_pinyin:
shān
to delete
удалить
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 删)
Antonyms: 增
Ideographic: To cut 刂 out passages from a book 冊
purpleculture_examples:
刪除 [ shān chú ]: to delete; to cancel
刪改 [ shān gǎi ]: to edit; to modify; to alter (written material)
刪節 [ shān jié ]: to abridge; to cut a text down to size for publication
刪減 [ shān jiǎn ]: to abridge (a text); to edit out (of a movie); to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 冊 [ cè ] book, volume, register, list
    • 刂 [ dāo ] knife
heisig_chinese_memo: The spell book deleted all recipes requiring big objects like sabers because most people don't have pots big enough to fit them.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The saber series had some great volumes but I deleted the ending and made my own because it sucked.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " book " to the " knife ", it means that the book will be trimmed with a knife. " Delete " means deletion, modification, or ruling. "Shuowen": "Delete, cut it. From the sword, the book. The book, the book." Xu Kai's family biography: "In ancient times, the bamboo slips were used, so Confucius deleted "Poems" and "Books," and there were choices. Duan Yucai's note: "If you delete everything, you will get something if you go away. For example, in the "Records of the History. The Biography of Sima Xiangru", it says: "Therefore, if you delete the essentials, it will be the right way." Sectioning also." Such as "Lun Heng. "Knowing the Real": "Therefore, I retired from "Spring and Autumn", and deleted "Poetry" and "Book"." "Han Shu. "Arts and Literature": "Han Xing, Zhang Liang, and Han Xin ordered the art of war. There are a hundred and eighty-two schools, and you need to use them when you delete them. There are thirty-five schools."

" Delete " also means deletion. "Guang Yun. "Delete rhyme": "Delete, remove also cut." Such as "Han Shu. "Law Lizhi": "So delete its hypocritical words, take justice, and write in the article." "Sui Shu. "Ching Ji Zhi": "It was taken from the old admissions, the textual meaning is simple and vulgar, and the teaching is unhelpful, and it is deleted."

" Delete " also means elimination. For example, in the Tang Dynasty, Han Yu's "Send to Cui Twenty-Six Chenggong after Xuehou": "When you come back, you will lie down and lie down. Who can delete your heart's chaos." Zhou Lianggong of the Qing Dynasty "Tongren Baitai Thatched Cottage": "You may not be idle here , Hundred Nian is hard to delete, but I deleted myself.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " book " to the " knife ", it means to cut the book with a knife. " Deletion " means deletion or ruling also said that slashing.
humanum_full_description:
從「冊」從「刀」，會以刀修削簡冊之意。「刪」表示刪改、裁定。《說文》：「刪，剟也。从刀、冊。冊，書也。」徐鍇繫傳：「古以簡牘，故曰孔子刪《詩》、《書》，言有所取舍也。」段玉裁注：「凡言刪剟者，有所去即有所取。如《史記．司馬相如傳》曰：『故刪取其要，歸正道而論之。』刪取猶節取也。」如《論衡．知實》：「故退作《春秋》，刪定《詩》、《書》。」《漢書．藝文志》：「漢興，張良、韓信序次兵法，凡百八十二家，刪取要用，定著三十五家。」

　　「刪」也表示削除。《廣韻．刪韻》：「刪，除削也。」如《漢書．律曆志》：「故刪其偽辭，取正義，著于篇。」《隋書．經籍志》：「其舊錄所取，文義淺俗、無益教理者，並刪去之。」

　　「刪」還表示消除。如唐代韓愈〈雪後寄崔二十六丞公〉：「歸來殞涕揜關臥，心之紛亂誰能刪。」清代周亮工〈同人柏臺茅屋成〉：「遊仙未必此中閒，百念難刪竟自刪。」
humanum_short_description: 從「冊」從「刀」，會以刀修削簡冊之意。「刪」表示刪改、裁定，又表示削除。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
刪 (Simplified: 删)
Pinyin: shān
English Definition: to delete
Antonyms: 增
Total strokes: 7; Radical: 刀
Ideographic: To cut 刂 out passages from a book 冊
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 冊 [ cè ] book, volume, register, list
    • 刂 [ dāo ] knife
Example Words:
刪除 [ shān chú ]: to delete; to cancel
刪改 [ shān gǎi ]: to edit; to modify; to alter (written material)
刪節 [ shān jié ]: to abridge; to cut a text down to size for publication
刪減 [ shān jiǎn ]: to abridge (a text); to edit out (of a movie); to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
More: 刪* | *刪 | *刪*

刪字的基本解释

刪
shān
ㄕㄢˉ
同“删”。

刪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shān］
［《廣韻》所姦切，平删，生。］
亦作“刪1”。
(1)削除；去掉。
(2)节取；采取。
(3)删定。
(4)砍削；剪除。
(5)消除；消失。

刪字的康熙字典解释

字源演变：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

暂无。
